title: contemporary font used in Brown Jordan furniture ad
author: whatsmytype

comments.content:
BROWN JORDAN appears to be Futura Medium:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/futura/medium/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180323/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/futura/medium/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/futura/medium/")

The tagline appears to be Futura Book.

(It was designed in 1928 by Paul Renner, so "contemporary" is relative....)
